Getting Started

Welcome to the getting started guide. Follow these steps to set up your environment.

Prerequisites

Before you begin, make sure you have:

  • Python 3.9 or higher
  • Git
  • A text editor

Installation

Run the following command:

pip install our-package
our-package --version

Warning: Make sure to use a virtual environment!

Next Steps

After installation, check out the detailed installation guide.
